dcterms:creator: Takumi Watanabe
Hiroki Takahashi
Yusuke Iwasawa
Yutaka Matsuo
Ikuko Eguchi Yairi
dcterms:description: A dataset containing acceleration data collected from wheelchair users to evaluate road surface conditions. The data includes triaxial accelerometer readings and was used to train deep neural networks for classifying road surface conditions.
dcterms:title: Wheelchair Acceleration Database

dcterms:description: A dataset containing features extracted from wheelchair acceleration data to visualize sidewalk accessibility. This dataset is used to accumulate and visualize accessibility information.
dcterms:title: Sidewalk Feature Dataset

dcterms:description: Positional data collected from the Quasi-Zenith Satellite System (QZSS) during wheelchair driving experiments. This data is used as weak supervision for learning road surface conditions.
dcterms:title: Positional Data from QZSS

dcterms:description: Labels for road surface conditions created from visual observations during wheelchair driving experiments. These labels categorize the conditions into classes such as slopes, curbs, and tactile indicators.
dcterms:title: Road Surface Condition Labels

dcterms:description: A dataset containing general information about road surface conditions, used to assess sidewalk barriers for wheelchair users.
dcterms:title: General Road Surface Conditions
